articles.title: Ohio State University Trademarks ‘The’ - The New York Times
articles.description: The trademark will offer the school, whose supporters famously emphasize the article in its name, some protection against unlicensed merchandise sellers.
articles.content:
Ohio State University has received a trademark for one of the most common words in the English language, one that the schools supporters often forcefully emphasize when uttering its name: The.
